Title: Relates to the credit for rehabilitation of historic properties
Summary: Relates to the credit for rehabilitation of historic properties; authorizes the disproportionate allocation of such credit; authorizes the sale or transfer of such credit, in whole or in part, to one or more persons provided any credit may not be sold or transferred more than three times.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the credit for rehabilitation of historic properties
